bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with chi you feng 赤游風 , red roaming wind. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry wu wei zi 五味子 quotes XEWSZWLF : 赤游風丹，漸漸腫大。五味子焙研，熱酒頓 服一錢自消 , “[To cure] red roaming wind cinnabar associated with a gradual swelling and increase in size, bake wu wei zi over a slow fire and grind to a powder. Consume 1 qian with hot wine, and it will dissolve”. Chi you feng zheng 赤游風疹 , red roaming wind papules [1]

Pathological Condition identical with chi you feng 赤游風 , red roaming wind. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry gan jiao 甘蕉：赤游風疹，方同上（芭蕉根搗爛塗之） , “For red roaming wind papules the recipe is identical with the preceding one (external application of ba jiao root pounded to a pulp)”.
